page.title: 12 HEALTH FACILITIES
page.content: Main facility is the health clinic (NHS),Higher Lane.Open five days a week.Two doctors open 5.5 days a week from 8:30.Three thousand on register. Approx.sixty patients daily. Facilities:Family-planning,infant wel- fare,Well-woman(smear tests etc.), mothercraft (relaxation),ante-natal, chiropody,dental surgery,speech ther- apy,baby clinic.Consultant for Ante- Natal Clinic on Friday and visiting District Nurse. Natural Treatment Clinic:(private, family business),Higher Lane.Twenty patients daily.Open 3.5 days a week. Facilities:Osteopathy,herbalism,home- opathy,acupuncture,physiotherapy,manip- ulation. Dental Surgery(NHS),Church Road:three dentists,one hygenist.One hundred patients daily.Doctor's surgery(NHS) Church Road:1 doctor,well established.
